alert.note: Alert for Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 11:57PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Logan, east central Scott, central Yell and southwestern Pope Counties through 1245 AM CST... At 1156 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stonehouse Recreation Area, or 11 miles southeast of Booneville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Danville... Dardanelle... London... Magazine... Blue Mountain... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Mt Nebo State Park... Mount Magazine... Lake Dardanelle... Petit Jean River WMA... Mosley... Belleville... Havana... Corinth... Ranger... Spring Lake Campground... Macedonia in Yell County... Waveland... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 76 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for western and central Arkansas.
